message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer!  I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend. Would you be willing to come down to $80? Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that $150 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go down to $80 just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. $110 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm happy to pay $95.  This is my final offer, as I'm ready to buy from John at $80 if this doesn't work out.

Hi Bob, I understand that $95 is still a bit below my target price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $105. This is my final offer, as I'm not willing to go any lower. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in!
